name: DeleteCustomerCard
description: Removes a card on file from a customer.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer that the card on file belongs to.

card_id.description: The ID of the card on file to delete.

$block:
Defines the fields that are included in the response body of
a request to the `DeleteCustomerCard` endpoint.

$ul: **errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
